commands.name: alias list
commands.description: List all aliases currently set on your local computer.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

commands.name: alias set
commands.description: Set one or more aliases on your local computer.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

commands.name: alias unset
commands.description: Unset one or more aliases that are currently set on your local computer.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --no-prompt
optionalFlags.description: Don't prompt the user for confirmation when unsetting all aliases.
